title: OrderRx
description: Developed a system that would allow pharmacies to schedule prescription ordering on behalf of patients.It was built with a react front-end that interacted with a rest API made with .NET.

title: PharmaFriends
description: Developed the full-stack for web-application that would allow pharmacists to conduct NMS consultations remotely. This was built with node.js, express and mysql.

title: SSH Honeypot
description: A medium-interaction SSH honeypot built with Python and Paramiko, featuring an emulated filesystem and logger to track user activity. This was made for my undergrad dissertation project.

title: Country Caravan Care
description: Developed a responsive, accessible website for Country Caravan Care, providing essential business information to customers.
